column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went once when they first opened
column3: but since then have tried going 5 times and there is always at least an hour wait
column4: even on weekdays or towards the end of the night. Made worse by the fact they don't take reservations
column5: don't seat you unless everyone is there
column6: and don't have anywhere to wait. I can't rate something positively if I can't even eat there anymore.
